jobDescription: Jr. Business/Data AnalystPleasanton, CA1 yr. ContractDescription: Seeking a full-time Data Analyst. You will be responsible for analyzing, reporting, and normalizing large data sets. Your goal is to continuously improve the data foundation so the Product and Engineering teams can build products that deliver high value to our customers. If you have a "get it done” positive attitude, business acumen, and analytical thinking skills, this may be the perfect opportunity for you. Responsibilities:Monitor and improve database quality through the use of internal data toolsPerform industry and company research to improve how we classify Big Data.Document and summarize findings that support research resultsCreate and run reports, enter data as required, and conduct research inquiries as directedRequirements:College Degree (BA/BS)Strong research and analytical skills or demonstrated aptitudeDiscipline and determination to resolve complex problemsExcellent writing, editing, communications, organizational, and decision-making skillsAbility to work in a fast-paced environmentComputer proficient and experience using packages such as Microsoft Office and Google SpreadsheetsThis is an entry level position; recent graduates are encouraged to apply!
